name: Asia Pacific Conference on Curriculum Studies and Instructional Designing
content: The Asia Pacific Conference on Curriculum Studies and Instructional Designing 2018 is pleased to announce its First Call for Papers! The theme this year is: "Program Evaluation and Educational Leadership: Innovations and Challenges". Researchers are invited to submit their abstracts in any of the following strands across disciplines and educational levels: Evaluation Models - Curriculum Evaluation - Instructional Evaluation Innovative Practices in Evaluation Challenges in Evaluation Evaluation System and Logistics - Tools in Evaluation - Quality Assurance - Accreditation - Ranking Beneﬁts of Evaluation Submit your abstracts to abstracts@apccsid.net. Acknowledgement email will be sent upon receipt of your email. Notiﬁcation of results of peer review will be sent at least two weeks upon receipt of your abstract.
organizers: Asia Pacific Research Association on Curriculum Studies Inc.
